reviewText: I'm giving it 4 instead of 5 stars because it was missing the bag in the picture. Other than that, my daughter loved the DVDs and the stuffed bear.
I have a 3 month old that loves watching Pim. It's the only quiet time I get. I highly recommend Little Pim over anything else.
My son is 5 months old and he LOVES Pim.  He will belly laugh and stays entertained through and entire disc (sometimes more than once).
